entry.title: 108" Premium Lace White Round Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2251
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 11.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Round Tablecloth
Material: 100% Polyester
Color: White
Feature: Scalloped edge with intricate lace floral design
Size: 108"
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Premium Lace Tablecloth

Such a fanciful fusion of style and simplicity! Our classic, yet elegant lace tablecloths bring that vintage touch to your table settings that many couples seek to achieve, with a homey feel and relaxed mood, your guests will surely have the best time celebrating your special day with you. Featuring chic floral design crafted on premium quality polyester, this delicate lace tablecloth will dress your plain and boring tables to the nines.

Premium Quality Lace

The high quality lace has intricately been fashioned in eye-catching floral design to give that sheer delicate-looking texture to the tablecloths that will exude oodles of elegance and imperial sophistication to your home or wedding decor.

  
 

Stylish Vintage Looks!

Besides being a classy and swish choice for weddings and parties, these tablecloths fit perfectly for those jolly moments at home with friends and family that you rejoice while relishing your home baked delights and cherishing those heart to heart talks with your close ones!

    Additional Information:

    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
    • Easy to clean and helps protect your table


    Linen Care Instructions

entry.title: 21FT Blush | Rose Gold Premium Pleated Lace Table Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2240
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 43.99 - 249.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Polyester
Measurements: 21ft wide x 29" tall
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
For 1 piece table skirt only. Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
All table skirts come with velcro on top for attachment to clips. (CLIPS ARE SOLD SEPARATELY)
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Lush Polyester Lace coupled with gorgeous floral design make our table skirts a perfect adornment for decorating your lackluster and boring banquet and wedding tables. Our pretty double layered lace table skirts add elegance, delicacy and style to any table settings. This dual layered lace polyester table skirt feature a top layer of floral patterned lace, while standard polyester skirting as bottom layer. Dress your wedding or banquet tables up in the most stylish manner with these floriated lace table skirts. Create an ambiance of timeless elegance with these breathtaking lace table skirts. Transform your banquet or wedding tables into regal tablescapes with these plush darlings. The very sight of these swish table skirts will bedazzle your guests, exuding unsurpassed class and seamless style. Pair these exotic decorative accents with matching or contrastive shade table covers, table runners, chair skirts, chair covers, and more!

Additional Information:

  • Material : Polyester
  • Measurements : 21ft wide x 29" tall
  • How to Care : Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • For 1 piece table skirt only. Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
  • All table skirts come with velcro on top for attachment to clips. (CLIPS ARE SOLD SEPARATELY)
  • Uses : Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Guideline to choosing the right size:

 

  • 14ft Skirts : Covers 3 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 10 clips recommended
  • 17ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 15 clips recommended, Covers 3 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table
  • 21ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table - 20 clips minimum needed - 24 clips recommended

entry.title: 120" White Round Polyester Floral Lace Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 12.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Material: Premium Polyester Lace
Size: 120” Diameter
Color: White
Thickness: 75GSM
Gives floor length hang on 5 ft (60") table
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Fashioned in charming floral pattern, our appealing Lace Tablecloths are sure to enhance the elegance and attraction of your plain party tables and table linens. This premium quality 75 gsm polyester lace tablecloth is highly durable and desirable for accenting your wedding tables, party tables, banquet tables, dessert tables, and even your family dining tables. Use this floral fantasy in conjunction with matching satin or polyester table covers to attain a sophisticated harmony, or pair with vibrant hued linens to create a classy contrastive appeal.

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Polyester Lace
  • Size: 120” Diameter
  • Color: White
  • Thickness: 75GSM
  • Gives floor length hang on 5 ft (60") table

  • 17ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 15 clips recommended, Covers 3 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table
  • 21ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table - 20 clips minimum needed - 24 clips recommended

entry.title: 17FT White Premium Pleated Lace Table Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2240
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 38.99 - 219.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Polyester
Measurements: 17ft wide x 29" tall
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
For 1 piece table skirt only. Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
All table skirts come with velcro on top for attachment to clips. (CLIPS ARE SOLD SEPARATELY)
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Lush Polyester Lace coupled with gorgeous floral design make our table skirts a perfect adornment for decorating your lackluster and boring banquet and wedding tables. Our pretty double layered lace table skirts add elegance, delicacy and style to any table settings. This dual layered lace polyester table skirt feature a top layer of floral patterned lace, while standard polyester skirting as bottom layer. Dress your wedding or banquet tables up in the most stylish manner with these floriated lace table skirts. Create an ambiance of timeless elegance with these breathtaking lace table skirts. Transform your banquet or wedding tables into regal tablescapes with these plush darlings. The very sight of these swish table skirts will bedazzle your guests, exuding unsurpassed class and seamless style. Pair these exotic decorative accents with matching or contrastive shade table covers, table runners, chair skirts, chair covers, and more!

Additional Information:

  • Material : Polyester
  • Measurements : 17ft wide x 29" tall
  • How to Care : Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • For 1 piece table skirt only. Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
  • All table skirts come with velcro on top for attachment to clips. (CLIPS ARE SOLD SEPARATELY)
  • Uses : Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Guideline to choosing the right size:

 

  • 14ft Skirts : Covers 3 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 10 clips recommended
  • 17ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 15 clips recommended, Covers 3 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table
  • 21ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table - 20 clips minimum needed - 24 clips recommended
